Headline: #81W West Lawrence Temporary Reroute at The Pavillion Apartments
ShortDescription: #81W buses are temporarily rerouted via East River Road, Catalpa, and Delphia Avenue due to construction near The Pavillion Apartments.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#81W West Lawrence buses are temporarily rerouted via East River Road, Catalpa, and Delphia Avenue due to construction near The Pavillion Apartments.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound Reroute near Columbus/Randolph
ShortDescription: Southbound 124 Navy Pier buses are rtd via Columbus, Monroe, Michigan, Madison, then resume their normal route due to street blockage at Lower Columbus/Randolph

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Columbus, Monroe, Michigan, Madison, then resume their normal route due to street blockage at Lower Columbus/Randolph.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
